description: Leaf disk samples to be used for pigments and/or phenol/tannin analyses.

elements.description: The site in which the leaf sample was collected. Used as a filter to only show bulk leaf samples collected in the selected site.
elements.label: Filter: Site

elements.description: The leaf sample from which leaf disks are collected.
elements.label: Sample

elements.description: Comments or notes about the sample.
elements.label: Sample Remarks

elements.description: Unique field ID for the vial. Defined as the bulk leaf sample ID from which the leaf disks were taken from.
elements.label: Vial ID

elements.description: A barcode or QR code that identifies the vial.
elements.label: Vial Barcode

elements.description: Comments or notes about the vial or leaf disk sample.
elements.label: Vial Remarks

elements.description: The date when leaf disks were collected from the bulk leaf sample.
elements.label: Date Collected

elements.description: A list of names of people responsible for collecting the leaf disks. The primary collector, especially one who applies a personal identifier (Vial ID or Barcode), should be listed first.
elements.label: Collected By

elements.description: Comments or notes about the leaf disk collection event.
elements.label: Event Remaks

elements.description: The cryobox in which vials containing leaf disks are stored.
elements.label: Box

elements.description: The vial position number within the cryobox.
elements.label: Position in Box

name: Leaf Disks

status_field.description: Status of record. Record first requires verification. Once verified, it can be submitted for approval; this locks the record for standard users. If approved, the record eventually gets published. If rejected, it goes back to standard users for further verification.
status_field.label: Record Status
